name: Khamaseen
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage + 5 (2d4) lightning.

actions.name: Choking Cloud (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Surrounds itself with large cloud of dust and debris. Each creature within 10 ft. of the khamaseen must make DC 12 Con save or be incapacitated for 1 min. While incapacitated the creature is unable to breathe and coughs uncontrollably. An incapacitated creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

reactions.name: Shock
reactions.desc: If a creature wearing metal armor or wielding a metal weapon or shield moves within 5 ft. of khamaseen it takes 5 (2d4) lightning (DC 12 Dex negates).

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Stinging Dust
special_abilities.desc: Is surrounded by a cloud of swirling dust and small stones. A creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of the khamaseen must make DC 12 Con save or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn. On a successful save the creature is immune to the khamaseen's Stinging Dust for the next 24 hrs.
